marinovhome.title: Copper Helmet - Large
marinovhome.description: Elevate your decor with our stunning Copper Helmet. Handcrafted to perfection, this exquisite piece combines artistry and heritage. Its lustrous surface and intricate detailing add a touch of timeless elegance to any space. A captivating blend of craftsmanship and style, this copper helmet is a statement piece that exudes sophistication.

caretips.tip1text: Wipe with a soft, lint-free cloth to prevent buildup.

caretips.tip2text: Use mild soap and warm water; avoid abrasive tools.

caretips.tip3text: Embrace natural tarnish for an aged look or polish for shine.

caretips.tip4text: Embrace natural tarnish for an aged look or polish for shine.

caretips.tip5text: Dry thoroughly after exposure to water.

caretips.tip6text: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunligh.

marinovjewelry.title: Copper Spiral & White Beads Earrings
marinovjewelry.description: Blending modern style with classic elegance, we introduce our Copper Spiral and White Beads Earrings. Crafted with precision, these earrings feature gracefully coiled copper spirals, adding a touch of contemporary flair. The pristine white beads suspended within the spirals bring a clean and timeless aesthetic to the design. Elevate your look with this understated yet captivating accessory, perfect for both casual and formal occasions.

caretips.tip1text: Copper can tarnish when exposed to moisture. Remove your earrings before swimming, showering, or participating in activities that may involve water.

caretips.tip2text: Store your earrings in a dry place, away from humidity. Consider keeping them in a jewelry box or airtight container to prevent tarnishing.

caretips.tip3text: To maintain the shine of the copper, clean the earrings regularly with a soft, dry cloth. You can also use a jewelry polishing cloth specifically designed for copper.

caretips.tip4text: Keep your earrings away from chemicals such as perfumes, lotions, and hairsprays, as these can accelerate tarnishing. Put on your earrings after applying these products. Gentle Handling: Handle your earrings with care to prevent bending or misshaping of the copper wire. Avoid dropping them on hard surfaces.
